function ERU_EP05_19()
    -- .結-2【3月第1週】「誰かの理想を背負って」
    SaveData.Title = "誰かの理想を背負って"

    -- //BG：2F廊下（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013bb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav")

    -- //SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
WAIT(1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2417.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Sister, I hear footsteps from above!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0094.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Serious
 "Yes. Looks like we can catch up somehow." ]])

    MSG([[ When we finally reached the second-floor hallway, I was able to sense Hermes-san’s presence. ]])

    MSG([[ To catch up faster, we increased our running speed simultaneously without exchanging words, as if in sync. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

    -- //BG：3F廊下（夜）
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013cc")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BG：4F廊下（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013bd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ But just as we got close to the rooftop—a disturbing sound came from just above. ]])

    -- //SE：机の転がる音
PLAY_SE("SEa045.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0095.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Serious
 "Minachan, duck! A desk is rolling down!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2418.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "A desk!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Had it been deliberately thrown down? Or did it accidentally get knocked on the landing? ]])

    MSG([[ In any case, a desk was rolling down the stairs. ]])

    MSG([[ If it hit us head-on, it could be life-threatening. But we were going up the stairs with no way to dodge to the side. ]])

    MSG([[ I tried to jump in front to shield Marika-neesan. ]])

    -- //BU：マリカ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0096.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Serious
 "Minachan, get away!" ]])

    MSG([[ But Marika-neesan forcibly pulled me back. ]])

    MSG([[ Instead of blocking the rolling desk— ]])

    MSG([[ she actually struck it with her own elbow. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0097.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Serious
 "Ikusa-style arrest technique—<r=サルスベリ>Sarusuberi</r>!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",300,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",300,false)

    MSG([[ As soon as the desk hit Marika-neesan’s body, it bounced away like a superball. ]])

    -- //SE：机の転がる音（小）
PLAY_SE("SEa045.wav")

    MSG([[ ‘Sarusuberi’ is originally a technique to divert striking attacks. I never imagined that someone as skilled as Marika-neesan could make it so powerful. ]])

    MSG([[ Once again, I was overwhelmed by the sheer talent of my sister. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Sad
 "Ugh..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2419.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 "Marika-neesan!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Even Marika-neesan seemed to have paid a heavy price. She knelt down in pain, apparently injuring her leg, letting out a small groan. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2420.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Sad
 "Hang in there...! I’ll do first aid now." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0099.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Sad
 "No...! Hurry after Aru-chan!" ]])

    MSG([[ She rejected me as I tried to approach, speaking firmly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0100.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Serious
 "Go quickly to where Eru-chan and Aru-chan are!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2421.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Flustered
 "B-But Sister, your injury is terrible too..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Serious
 "This kind of wound will heal with time! But only Minachan can heal the wounds they’ve suffered in their hearts!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2422.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "I-I’m the only one who can heal them?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0102.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Serious
 "Minachan, remember this: physical wounds heal eventually. But wounds of the heart can never be healed alone." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0103_1.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Sad
 "I too, long ago, lost to Eru-chan in the Princess Election and betrayed everyone's expectations, and I thought about dying many times." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0103_02.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Sad
 "In fact, you know well that I gave up on living and spent a long time asleep, right?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0104.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Serious
 "But even though it was so painful, I was able to keep living because Minachan and Akichan whom I trust... and also Daria were there for me." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0105.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Serious
 "If even one person genuinely supports you, you can surely do your best. You can live looking forward. That’s how people are." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0106.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Sad
 "But now, Eru-chan and Aru-chan are alone. They were always together but now separated, and rejected even by the mom they trusted most. I can’t even imagine how deeply sad that is." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0107.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】Serious
 "It’s ironic that I, who lost to Eru-chan and the others long ago, understand them best... Go now, Minachan. Take care of them in my stead." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2423.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "...Leave it to me! I will absolutely save Hermes-san and the others!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

    MSG([[ Bearing Marika-neesan’s wishes, I started to climb the stairs again. ]])

    MSG([[ To heal Hermes-san and the others’ wounds of the heart with my own hands. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_20")
end
